name: Registration Process from signup page to public profile sharing. (Personal account)
explanation:
1. Click on Register link in the navbar
  2. Choose the Account type, `Personal`
  3. Choose the plan that fit you
  4. Type your username, email, password and password confirmation
  5. Check the re-captcha input
  6. Check the input I accept terms and confitions, `You can read terms and conditions by clicking on the text`
  7. Click Register button
  8. If there isn't any errors, then an email was sent to your email
  9. From your email, click on the verification link
  10. Click on Login link in the navbar
  11. Type your username and password and click Login
  12. The popup will be shown to complete your subscription
  13. Click on Go Ahead button in the popup
  14. From Subscription Status section click on Go Ahead button
  15. Choose the plan that fits you
  16. Choose the currency and type the credit card data then click Pay
  17. From General Status section click on Go Ahead button
  18. Fill up your names and record your pronunciations (Please check pronunciations recording quality)
  19. Click on Confirm button to save the changes
  20. From the user icon in the navbar click My Pronunciation to go to edit profile page
  21. You can show the steps of recording pronunciation in Adding/Editing Records in profile. question
  22. You can delete your account as you wish. However, your account will be completely deleted one month after expiry unless you renew it from account status page.

name: Registration Process from signup page to public profile sharing. (Corporate account)
explanation:
1. Click on Register link in the navbar
  2. Choose the Account type, `Company`
  3. Choose the plan that fit you
  4. Type your username, email, password and password confirmation
  5. Check the re-captcha input
  6. Check the input I accept terms and confitions, `You can read terms and conditions by clicking on the text`
  7. Click Register button
  8. If there isn't any errors, then an email was sent to your email
  9. From your email, click on the verification link
  10. Click on Login link in the navbar
  11. Type your username and password and click Login
  12. The popup will be shown to complete your subscription
  13. Click on Go Ahead button in the popup
  14. From Subscription Status section click on Go Ahead button
  15. Choose the plan that fits you
  16. Choose the currency and type the credit card data then click Pay
  17. From General Status section click on Go Ahead button
  18. Fill up your names and record your pronunciations (Please check pronunciations recording quality)
  19. Click on Confirm button to save the changes
  20. From the user icon in the navbar click My Pronunciation to go to edit profile page
  21. You can show the steps of recording pronunciation in Adding/Editing Records in profile. question
  22. From the user icon in the navbar click Employees to go to employees page
  23. You have two methods to add employees of your company:
    1. Type the employee email in the input and click Submit to add employees one by one.
    2. Or click on Upload sheet button to upload excel sheet with employees emails in the first column and employees names on the second one then click Submit button to add these employees
    The number of employee shouldn't exceed the maximum number of employees your plan
  24. You can delete your account as you wish. However, your account will be completely deleted one month after expiry unless you renew it from account status page.

name: Adding/Editing Profile Picture.
explanation:
1. From the user icon in the navbar click My Account to go to account page
  2. Scroll down to image input, click Choose Image
  3. Choose an image from your device
  4. Crop the image then click Done cropping
  5. If you want to remove the image and return to the default image, check Revert to Default Image input
  6. Click Confirm button to save the changes

name: Adding/Editing Personal Identity/Professional/Promotional Video .
explanation:
1. From the user icon in the navbar click My Account to go to account page
  2. Scroll down to video input, click Choose Video
  3. Choose video from your device
  4. Make sure that the video size does not exceed 10MB
  5. If you want to remove the video, check Delete my video input
  6. Click Confirm button to save the changes

name: Adding/Editing Records in profile.
explanation:
1. From the user icon in the navbar click My Pronunciation to go to edit profile page
  2. Click on the record icon on any input you want to record the pronunciation for
  3. You have two choices:
    1. First, Record your voice
      • Click on the record icon to record your voice
      • Click stop icon after recording the pronunciation
      • Listen to the record by clicking on the play button
    2. Second, you can upload the record from your device
  4. Click Done button to save the record
  5. If the button text changes to Saved then the record is saved, then you can close the modal

name: Hiding Profiles from public access temporarily .
explanation:
1. From the user icon in the navbar click My Account to go to account page
  2. From the sidebar click on Account status link
  3. On General Status section click on Hide my profile button to hide your profile
  4. To reset the profile, on General Status section click on Publish my profile button to make your profile public

name: Payment flow.
explanation:
1. From the user icon in the navbar click My Account to go to account page
  2. From the sidebar click on Account status link
  3. From Subscription Status section click on Go Ahead button
  4. Choose the plan that fits you
  5. Choose the currency and type the credit card data then click Pay
